::KitKat:;

"No, one should die just because one made a mistake.  You should 
learn from your mistake and try not to make the same mistake over and 
over again.  Just because you think you make a bad choice, that 
doesn't mean you should be punnished for it."





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Land Mine sighed.
> 
> "You see, if I don't punish me then who will? I failed as a Predacon
> already, I cannot believe it, after all of that work back of 
Cybertron."
> Land Mine said. She didn't feel good and KitKat wasn't helping by 
confusing
> her. Shouldn't one die for actions done wrong?
> 
> "KitKat, shouldn't one die for actions done wrong? I did alot wrong,
> including my Grammar and my treating of our leader, I'm sorry." 
Land Mine
> said. She took the knife back.
> 
> "When i die, make sure this knife goes with me." She said before 
putting the
> knife away...
